name: The Bomb Project
description:
In 1979, an FBI agent uncovered a secret Soviet technology, capable of rapidly lobbing hundreds of explosives at it's target, destroying everything in sight. Their first test subject? You, the captured agent.

Trek your way across the United Socialist Soviet Republics as the threat becomes increasingly complex. You'll need to keep on your toes to face the new bombs introduced at every level, such as landmines, freeze-bombs, napalm missiles and crates of radioactive waste. But as more and more bombs blow up, so does the terrain around you. Try not to get caught in a crater too deep with no way out!

Features:

  • 24 levels increasing in difficulty
  • 20 different flavors of explosives
  • 4 different environments
  • 4 boss fights
  • Unlock new characters with special abilities
  • Accept contracts if you feel like you're up to the extra challenge
  • Co-op, meant to test your ability to work as a team (Split Screen Only)
  • Endless mode; how long can you survive under constant bombardment?
